Package Components.Concrete.Grammar

Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Grammar component.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IGrammarComp
    Defines services for interacting with all grammar-dependent components of the framework.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CGrammarComp
    A component which holds lexical and context-free grammar definitions, and relations between them.
    CGrammarCompBeanInfo
    This class implements Java's BeanInfo interface to restrict the Grammar's features exposed to the public.
    CGrammarEditor
    An editor for editing a Grammar in a structure preserving way.
    CGrammarPropertyEditor
    A PropertyEditor which allows users to edit the internal structure of a grammar.
    CLexemeTableModel
    An implementation of a table model for lexeme definitions of a grammar.
    CNonTerminalsTableModel
    An implementation of a table model for nonTerminal definitions of a grammar.
    CTerminalTableModel
    An implementation of a table model for terminal definitions of a grammar.
    Symbols
    Defines a symbol object.

Package Components.Concrete.Grammar Description

Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Grammar component.
